name: Peas, Bell Pepper, Cashews in Tomato Cilantro Curry.
description: Peas, bell pepper, cashews in tomato cilantro curry. Another quick veggie curry, full of flavor and great for weeknights. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cilantro leaves and small stems
1 teaspoon dried fenugreek (, methi leaves (optional, I love the slight bitterneess from the fenugreek leaves))

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, blend tomatoes, serrano pepper, cilantro, garlic and ginger with a little water and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, blend tomatoes, serrano pepper, cilantro, garlic and ginger with a little water and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add a teaspoon oil and chopped onion, bay leaf and clove and cook at medium heat until onions are golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, add a teaspoon oil and chopped onion, bay leaf and clove and cook at medium heat until onions are golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cilantro tomato puree.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cilantro tomato puree.

recipeInstructions.text: Keep cooking on medium low heat, partially covered for 20-30 minutes till the puree thickens and leaves the sides of the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep cooking on medium low heat, partially covered for 20-30 minutes till the puree thickens and leaves the sides of the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in dried fenugreek leaves, salt, sugar and chili flakes and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in dried fenugreek leaves, salt, sugar and chili flakes and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for another 5 minutes until its a thick paste. Taste and adjust for salt and spice. Store or use as needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for another 5 minutes until its a thick paste. Taste and adjust for salt and spice. Store or use as needed.

itemListElement.text: If using frozen curry, thaw for half an hour, then add to a heated pan with a little oil.. Skip this step if using fresh curry.
itemListElement.name: If using frozen curry, thaw for half an hour, then add to a heated pan with a little oil.. Skip this step if using fresh curry.

itemListElement.text: In the pan with the simmering curry, add some peas, green or red bell pepper chopped and some chopped cashews., some salt to taste and water. Cook for 7-10 minutes until peas are done. Serve hot with roti/Chapati!, pickles and sliced onions and tomatoes topped with salt pepper and salad!
